name: Jake Paladini
coverLetter: grew up trimming and worked on farms both rec and med. I can tear down, buck or trim to dispensary standards. able to trim anywhere from 60 to 100 grams an hour depending on how larfy your buds are. Have a full time steady job and a home, can only work for a company beyond my schedule if I'm comfortable in the job security. Friday, Saturday and Tuesdays are available. Must be local please.
